RuleDetails.Rules:
Admin Fee IRR 750,000 Apply For Refund / Change Per Ticket
Refund: After 21 Working Days

APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 022/FLEX
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
RESTRICTED ONE WAY AND ROUND TRIP PC FARES
 APPLICATION
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.

FLIGHT APPLICATION
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY PC FLIGHT OPERATED BY PC.
  OR
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL FROM/TO IST/FRU
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY ZM FLIGHT OPERATED BY ZM.

ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.

STOPOVERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
     LIMITED TO 1 FREE AND 1 AT EUR 50.00.
       1 FREE IN TURKEY
       1 IN TURKEY AT EUR 50.00.

TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  4 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH
      DIRECTION
      FREE IN TURKEY
    FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON
     THE FARE COMPONENT.

PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
FOR ROUND TRIP FARES
   CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  END-ON-END
    END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH DOMESTIC/
    INTERNATIONAL FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. SIDE
    TRIPS PERMITTED.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE FOR CARRIER ZM/PC
  OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
    -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS.
     A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
     PERMITTED.
    -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER PC/ZM IN ANY
     RULE AND TARIFF.

TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS
 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 30OCT 16 AND ON/
  BEFORE 25MAR 17.

SALES RESTRICTIONS
 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 25MAR 17.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON PC.
  TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED
  BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING.

PENALTIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      PER DIRECTION CHARGE USD 80.00 FOR REISSUE.
         NOTE -
          FOR CHANGES MORE THAN 72H BEFORE DEPARTURE
          USD75.00
          --
          FOR CHANGES BETWEEN 72H AND 2H BEFORE DEPARTURE
          USD80.00.
          --
          FOR CHANGES LESS THAN 2H NO CHNG PERMTTED.
          --
          CHANGES NOT PERMITTED WITHIN 2 HOURS OF FLIGHT
          DEPARTURE AND WILL BE CONSIDERED AS NO-SHOW HENCE
          CANNOT BE FURTHER RE-ISSUED/RE-BOOKED.
          --
          IF OUTBOUND NOSHOW NO CHANGE PERMITTED. NEW OW
          MUST BE ISSUED. INBOUND CAN BE CHANGED ACCORDING
          TO THE FARE RULES.
          --
          CHANGES CAN BE PERFORMED TO THE SAME RBD OR TO A
          HIGHER RBD. NO REFUND OF ANY RESIDUAL VALUE
          APPLICABLE.
          CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED AS CP TAX.
          --
          CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REROUTING/REBOOKING
          PROVIDED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE COMPLIED
          WITH- REROUTING/REBOOKING PERMITTED PROVIDED ALL
          CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE
          PURCHASE AND COMBINABILITY ARE COMPLIED WITH
          IRRESPECTIVE IF CHANGE OCCURS TO OUTBOUND OR
          INBOUND FLIGHT.
          WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE
          THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED - AND - THE
          CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED.
          WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE NO
          RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE - AND - THE CHANGE
          FEE WILL BE APPLIED.
          --
                    UPGRADE TO ANY HIGHER FARE IS
          PERMITTED.
                    REBOOKING  CHARGE ALSO APPLIES IF ANY
  CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      PER DIRECTION CHARGE USD 130.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND.
         NOTE -
          FOR CANCELLATIONS MORE THAN 72H BEFORE DEPARTURE
          USD100.00
          --
          FOR CANCELLATIONS BETWEEN 72H AND 6H BEFORE
          DEPARTURE USD130.00
          --
          FOR CANCELLATIONS LESS THAN 6H NON REFUNDABLE.
          --
          TICKET IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NOSHOW
          --
          CHARGES SHALL NOT BE WAIVED FOR MEDICAL REASONS
          --
          YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE

HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  AREA 2/AREA 3 ARE EXCLUDED FROM THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE
  POINT RULE.

TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
  NONEND/PC ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
FOR ROUND TRIP FARES
  ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 80 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
    MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT
      BY ADULT
  OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 8-11 - CHARGE 80 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE USD 92.00.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT.

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION

APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS

      FREE IN TURKEY

   CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.

  END-ON-END

   PROVIDED -

     A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS

    -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS

SALES RESTRICTIONS
 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 25MAR 17.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON PC.
  TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED
  BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING.

PENALTIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      PER DIRECTION CHARGE USD 80.00 FOR REISSUE.
         NOTE -
          FOR CHANGES MORE THAN 72H BEFORE DEPARTURE
          USD75.00
          --

          --

          --

          DEPARTURE AND WILL BE CONSIDERED AS NO-SHOW HENCE
          CANNOT BE FURTHER RE-ISSUED/RE-BOOKED.
          --
          IF OUTBOUND NOSHOW NO CHANGE PERMITTED. NEW OW
          MUST BE ISSUED. INBOUND CAN BE CHANGED ACCORDING
          TO THE FARE RULES.
          --

          HIGHER RBD. NO REFUND OF ANY RESIDUAL VALUE
          APPLICABLE.
          CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED AS CP TAX.
          --
          CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REROUTING/REBOOKING

          WITH- REROUTING/REBOOKING PERMITTED PROVIDED ALL
          CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE

          IRRESPECTIVE IF CHANGE OCCURS TO OUTBOUND OR

          WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE

          CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED.
          WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE NO
          RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE - AND - THE CHANGE
          FEE WILL BE APPLIED.
          --
                    UPGRADE TO ANY HIGHER FARE IS
          PERMITTED.
                    REBOOKING  CHARGE ALSO APPLIES IF ANY
  CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
         NOTE -
          TICKET IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF
          NOSHOW/CANCEL/REFUND
          --
          FOR NON REFUNDABLE FARES YQ SURCHARGE IS NON
          REFUNDABLE
          --
          CHARGES SHALL NOT BE WAIVED FOR MEDICAL REASONS

HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

  NONEND/PC ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
FOR ROUND TRIP FARES
  ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - NO DISCOUNT
  OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 8-11 - NO DISCOUNT
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE USD 92.00.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT.

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION
